column4: Question: Whenever I login to ubuntu after entering password, it freezes for about 3 minutes. Also, whenever I open the network settings window.. it won't pull up, and will ahve to be force closed. Any ideas??
try switching to console and login from there, what did the logs say ?
I can't see anything that says timing out in the dmesg if that's what you're asking.. any other place I could look?
GNOME and X are big beasts, I'm not sure what's causing this, can you try installing a light-weight Window Manager, icewm or fvmw could help.
